pullrequest.title: Add countdown feature to common::Timer, expose countdown to TimerGUIPlugin

content.raw:
Yeah, it's a bit confusing.

By default, GetElapsed does what you expect: it starts at 0 and counts up.

This pull request adds the ability to initialize a timer as a "countdown", which means that GetElapsed some maximum time and then counts down.

This part of the test tests the countdown functionality. The earlier portion of the test counts the default functionality.

I'm receptive to implementing this in a less messy way; this was just a convenient way to get a countdown timer in the TimerGUIPlugin.
